title: Music, Science and Healing Intersect in an A.I. Opera
description: The work-in-progress “Song of the Ambassadors” got a test run at Alice Tully Hall — with Lincoln Center’s artistic director lending her brain.
dc:creator: Frank Rose
category: Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts
media:credit: Vincent Tullo for The New York Times
media:description: Shanta Thake, Lincoln Center’s artistic director, participating in a performance of “Song of the Ambassadors” at Alice Tully Hall.
